title: FS: 1913 Ottawa Baseball Team RPPC with Shag Shaughnessy! SOLD
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1913 Ottawa Baseball Team RPPC with Shag Shaughnessy! SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
I have a fantastic 1913 Ottawa Baseball Team Real Photo Postcard for sale featuring the man known as "Shag"! This postcard is postally unused and exhibits a few minor bends & wear on the edges. Not bad for being on this earth for over 100 years!

Price is SOLD. Paypal is preferred and this price does not include shipping. Feel free to ask any questions!
Jeff
